text: (But those who disbelieve) in Allah: the disbelievers of Mecca (and deny Our revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, (such are owners of the Fire) they are inhabitants of the Fire; (they will abide therein) they will abide in the Fire, never to die or leave it (a hapless journey's end) in the Hereafter in which they have ended up!
